description: Bangladesh's interim government has temporarily suspended visa services at its key diplomatic missions in India, including New Delhi, citing "security concerns." This move follows similar restrictions by India on Bangladeshi nationals. Dhaka is also seeking a reversal of United States visa bond requirement, deeming it "certainly unfortunate and painful for them."

description: US President Donald Trump has backed a bill that could levy 500% tariffs on countries buying Russian oil, giving the US leverage over major buyers such as China and India to curb imports from Moscow.

Right-wing organizations protested, calling it an insult to religious sentiments. An inquiry has been ordered, with officials seeking an explanation from the printing vendor.

This move aims to secure US interests and lower global oil prices.

'Donroe' doctrine: 5 reasons why Trump's Maduro shock was not about oil. It was a msg for Xi
description: The US seizure of Nicolas Maduro and control over Venezuela's oil marks a significant blow to China's influence in Latin America. This move, rerouting billions in crude to the US, undermines Beijing's decade-long economic diplomacy and its strategy of championing sovereignty. It signals that economic ties don't guarantee protection against US military power.

title: Khawaja Asif says Pakistan may not need IMF loans soon — what's behind the claim
description: Pakistan's defence minister claims a surge in aircraft orders, potentially ending IMF reliance within six months. This follows a military standoff with India and discussions with Bangladesh and Saudi Arabia for JF-17 fighter jet deals. The Pak minister expressed strong confidence in these orders materializing, suggesting a significant boost to Pakistan's economy.

title: Stefon Diggs–Cardi B drama grows as Patriots playoff distraction
description: The New England Patriots are winning, but celebrity drama, particularly involving Stefon Diggs and Cardi B, overshadows their on-field success. While quarterback Drake Maye shows promise, Diggs' crucial role in the offense is undeniable. Coach Mike Vrabel attempts to maintain focus amidst the off-field noise, but the team's playoff hopes hinge on managing these distractions.

title: Candace Owens questions Charlie Kirk after sharing unseen image with no blood
description: Candace Owens shared claims about a photo she says shows Charlie Kirk after an alleged shooting. She questioned the official story and named people she said could not be trusted. However, there is no verified evidence, police record, or official confirmation that Charlie Kirk was shot or killed. Her statements remain unproven and widely disputed.

title: Philanthropy push: Jeff Bezos’ ex-wife donates billions to non-profits; biggest giveaway in 2025
description: Mackenzie Scott, ex-wife of Amazon's founder, has significantly reduced her stake in the e-commerce giant, selling shares worth $13 billion.  She continues her massive philanthropic efforts, donating $7.1 billion to non-profits in 2025 alone, including over $1.2 billion to Historically Black Colleges and Universities.  These substantial, unrestricted grants are seen as a counterpoint to tech companies scaling back DEI initiatives.

title: Musk says he's impressed with China; highlights its rapid EV & solar growth
description: Elon Musk humorously noted China's rapid adoption of his energy ideas, from EVs and solar to massive battery production. He highlighted China's dominance in these sectors, contrasting it with US potential. Musk emphasized batteries, like Tesla's Megapacks, as crucial for doubling US energy throughput without new power plants, especially for AI's growing demands.

title: Tommy Fleetwood & Clare Fleetwood net worth: Golf earnings, sponsors, family
description: Tommy and Clare Fleetwood have built a significant fortune through Tommy's successful golf career, prize money, and lucrative brand deals. Clare, as his manager, plays a crucial role in their financial success and their private family life. Their collaborative approach has led to both on-course achievements and long-term financial stability.

title: Oilers’ Quinn Hutson decision sparks fan outrage over player development vision
description: Edmonton Oilers' decision to send promising rookie Quinn Hutson back to the AHL has sparked fan outrage, despite the team's winning streak.  Fans fear a repeat of past mistakes with Holloway and Broberg, whose departures are linked to similar roster management.  Hutson's brief NHL stint and strong AHL performance fuel concerns about short-term thinking impacting long-term player development and trust.

title: Travis Kelce hits breaking point as Taylor Swift reaches new career high
description: As the Chiefs wrapped up a disappointing season, Travis Kelce faced mounting questions about his NFL future and the possibility of retirement. At the same time, Taylor Swift reached another career high, extending her historic run atop the Billboard 200. The contrast highlighted a pivotal moment for the high-profile couple, with one career pausing as the other surged forward.
